title: Clinical Thinking Enhancement Program Based on Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic nursing theory and fundamental clinical skills
context.additional_context: Simulation-based learning program for pre-service teachers to enhance clinical judgment skills

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex patient scenarios and select appropriate nursing interventions using advanced simulation equipment.
Learners can improve critical thinking skills (analytical skills, confidence) by over 20% through simulation scenarios.
Learners can develop educational plans reflecting simulation experiences through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
